pageConfig.devDescription: I'm a developer who excels at turning complex challenges into smooth, well-crafted solutions. I focus on creating products that not only work seamlessly but also feel great to useâ€”engaging, efficient, and user-friendly.

projects.name: AutoScreen-AI
projects.description: An AI-powered system that automatically screens resumes based on job requirements, enhancing recruitment efficiency and accuracy.
projects.techStack: Python, Flask, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Machine Learning, NLP

modalcontent.content: Automates resume screening using AI and NLP, reducing bias and time, and providing accurate job-candidate matching via skill-based ML models.

projects.name: Farm Connect
projects.description: A platform to help farmers with crop information and purchases.

modalcontent.content: A multilingual crop education and e-commerce platform that empowers farmers with region-specific crop knowledge and allows them to purchase essential farming products in their preferred language.

projects.name: Budget Buddy
projects.description: A mobile application to track expenses with intuitive visualization.

modalcontent.content: A cross-platform expense tracker app that helps users monitor daily spending, categorize expenses, and maintain financial discipline through intuitive charts and summaries.

projects.name: Breeze
projects.description: An Android application for getting weather updates with beautiful UI.

modalcontent.content: A clean and minimal weather app that delivers real-time weather updates, temperature, humidity, and forecasts using the OpenWeatherMap API with a Kotlin-based Android interface.
